playlist.content.songList.header.title: Title
playlist.menu.layout.title: View as
playlist.edit.modal.title: Edit playlist
playlist.advanced.edit.modal.all.songs.r: All songs are marked for removal from this playlist. Actual removal will occur after you submit the changes.
playlist.advanced.create.modal.title: Create playlist
playlist.delete.modal.warning.text: This will delete the playlist {playlist} from your library, and you won't be able to restore it again. {additionalWarning}
playlist.delete.modal.warning.additional: Otherwise, you also can choose to transfer all the songs from this playlist to another one, or opt not to transfer them.
playlist.delete.modal.select.input.place: Select a playlist to transfer to
playlist.privacy.modal.warning.text: The playlist {playlist} will be set to private (it will be hidden from other users and removed from your profile). Of course, you can make it public again at any time.
